subsections.title: Shock Hazards, Fuses, Circuit Breakers
subsections.label: subsec:shock-fuses
prompts: Explain the concept of shock hazards in electrical circuits, including how electrical current can affect the human body.
Describe the purpose and function of fuses in electrical circuits, including how they protect against overloads.
Discuss the role of circuit breakers in electrical safety, including how they differ from fuses.
Explain the importance of correctly installing fuses and circuit breakers in 120V AC power circuits.
Describe the precautions necessary when measuring high voltages with a voltmeter, including the importance of using properly rated equipment.

Discuss the significance of black wire insulation in a three-wire 120V cable and its role in electrical safety.
